horsehotel.menus.register_horse.do_you_w: Do you want to register %s with the Horse Hotels?
horsehotel.menus.register_horse.your_hor: Your horse will be kept here until you take it out.
horsehotel.menus.register_horse.also_oth: You will also find your horse at the other Horse Hotels.
horsehotel.menus.welcome.horsehotel_netw: HorseHotel is a network of stables throughout the overworld
horsehotel.menus.welcome.to_register_wit: To register a horse, talk to a Stable Attendant while riding.
You can also use the Registry Block if the Stable Attendant is somewhere else.
horsehotel.menus.welcome.you_can_summon: Horses can be summoned from any HorseHotel stable.
horsehotel.menus.welcome.how_to_summon: Just interact with the Stable Attendant or Registry Block.
